column1: ronda jean glisson| ronda jean glisson. born: september 09
column5: 2015 at the university of kentucky medical center. she was born september 9
column6: 1970 in greensburg to jerry and teresa willis glisson sr. she was a homemaker. survivors include four children shannon thompson
column10: her grandchildren and brothers and sisters. memorial services will be announced at a later date. stegall-berheide-orr funeral home is handling arrangements. send sympathy card
